fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Infiltrate a target’s private chat during the night.
-Disable a player’s ability for the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you infiltrate a target, you will learn if they have any private chats. If they do, you will learn one of the following at random:
-The size of the chat
-The role of one random player in the chat
-The name of one other player in the chat
-A random message sent by a player in the chat
-If your target does not have any private chats, you will know.
-If your target has multiple private chats, one will be selected at random, and you will not be informed of that.
-If you disable a player’s ability, it will not be usable during the next night. If the target has multiple abilities, one will be chosen at random. In addition, you will learn the target’s role subcategory.
-You may disable an ability that has no ammo or otherwise cannot be used.
